Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: m salem zannerni
Reviews.Content: I realy would like to thank you. I got the camera in its time. It was kind of you. Many thanks to you and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras and prompt customer service!
Reviews.Author: JohnO "josman7"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with these - high quality images and very easy to set up - wireless is definitely the way to go!UPDATE (1/22/14) - Having a small, but easy to resolve, issue with one (1) of the outdoor cameras I purchased (I now have four (4) outdoor units, total):  I hope to have an update with "good news" about this issue soon.
